pageContext.claim: “How about the senator from Hawaii? … She wants the Green New Deal, and then they informed her that that does not include airplanes. And you're the senator from Hawaii. So they said, ‘What are you going to do?’ And then they talked about building a train to Hawaii, can you believe it? No, no, she wants it, even though you can't -- you'll never get to Hawaii again.”
pageContext.analysis: The video of this interview with Fox News shows that Sen. Mazie Hirono (D-Hawaii) was joking. Trump describes her as supporting the Green New Deal even though it would ban air travel and hamper the journey to Hawaii. The resolution does not ban air travel and Hirono did not say she supported the plan even though it would hamper trips to Hawaii.
